name: wp-simple-pay-lite
title: WP Simple Pay Lite for Stripe
description: Add high conversion Stripe Checkout forms to your WordPress site and start accepting payments in minutes. **Lite Version**

scripts.i18n: grunt clean:build && grunt sed:text_domain && grunt checktextdomain && wp --allow-root i18n make-pot . languages/stripe.pot --domain=stripe --exclude='*/js/src/*' && wp --allow-root i18n make-json languages --no-purge
